quotes.quote: One of the most beautiful things you can do for someone is to see and love them exactly as they are.
Home isn't where your body is; it's where your heart is.
As we get older, it matters less where you are and more who you're with.
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.quote: This year, I will spend quality time with people who are important to me.
Even when it feels as though no one is seeing your efforts, there are people out there who notice and appreciate everything you do.
I'm surrounded by great friends and family. I don't know what I would do without them.
quotes.author: Emma Roberts

quotes.quote: Families aren't created at birth. They're created by love.
Your family reminds you of who you are and where you come from on the days you have trouble remembering.
Family and friends are the ones we can depend on, even on days we have trouble depending on anything else.
The most wonderful thing the Universe could do for you is to set you in the midst of a loving family.
I sustain myself with the love of family.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The beauty of life is symbolized by the togetherness of a family.
Tell your loved ones how you feel about them, it could change their life.
My family comes first. Maybe that's what makes me different from other guys.
quotes.author: Bobby Darin

quotes.quote: Let love be the basis of your intentions with your loved ones, not deception or indifference.
Looking for cheerleaders? Look no further than your family.
The strength of a family isn't found in its numbers. It's found in its love.
You don't need to share blood or a last name to be a family. All you need to share is love.
Every family is perfectly imperfect in its own way.
Having somewhere to go is home. Having someone to love is family. Having both is a blessing.
Treat your friends like family and treat your family like friends, and everyone will be happier.
Family is a synonym for love.
Families love with a love that is greater than love.
Family is the place where you laugh the hardest and are loved the most.
After you are gone, people may forget most of what you have said and done. But they will remember that you loved them.
Family is the Universe's truest example of love.
Families always make time for love.
The days fly by when you spend them loving and being loved by family.
To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: A happy family gives you a foundation for a happy life.
Brothers and sisters are one of the constant things in the lives of many people.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Whether it's a small, tightly-knit nuclear family or a sprawling extended family, the days you spend with them are easily the best days of your life.
Everyone needs a house to live in, but a supportive family is what builds a home.
A house from which nobody ever went away without feeling better in some way. A house in which there was always laughter.
Let your family be a lighthouse, calling you home on the stormiest of nights.
A happy family is a little piece of Heaven right here on earth.
A family is so much stronger together.
The family that loves you helps you prepare to sail away, yet welcomes you with open arms when the winds bring you back.
How wonderful is it to look around you and see yourself surrounded by love? That's the greatest testament to a life well lived.
Family is anyone who inspires you to laugh louder and love harder.
Regardless of what else changes in your life, the love of your family is constant and sure.
Family isn't just who you are, it's who you want to be with.
Some of the best parts of you are the parts of you that you get from your family.
The home is always a home and a noble place for shaping hearts! A good home is good for life!
A house can be bought, but true shelter is only found in a family's love.
Hold onto who loves and honor you. Not everyone will know how to. Some souls don't even know how to love and honor themselves, let alone you.
Don't forget who was with you from the start.
Family bonds are some of the most beautiful and unbreakable ties you'll ever come across.
Respect and loyalty are bare minimums. No relationship is complete without them.
The lessons you learn from your family while young are the ones that you carry in your heart into adulthood.
Family is the foundation that happiness is built upon.
When the world is getting you down, your family will lift you up.
